meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Viraj Mehta Gary Tse Lilly Chin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7474.

td.p: Viraj Mehta, a junior at Stanford University from Austin, Texas
Gary Tse, a freshman at the United States Naval Academy from Ellicott City, Maryland
Lilly Chin, a senior at MIT from Decatur, Georgia

tr.td: YOU KIDS TODAY!
SPEED READING
BUSINESS
TV REALITY CHECK
19th CENTURY AMERICA
MY "BA-E"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with "B-A" and end with the letter E.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And interestingly enough, this character is in a different play when this line is delivered.)
...
(Alex: [To Gary] ...but it was in Henry VI, Part 3.)
VirajWho is Iago?
$2,718
GaryWho\'s Richard III?
$12,345
LillyWho is Richard III
$4,000
Richard III')

tr.td: SHAKESPEARE CHARACTERS
About himself he says, "Since the heavens have shap'd my body so, let hell make crook'd my mind to answer it"
Lilly
Gary
Viraj
Lilly
Gary
Viraj

17 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

(including 1 DD),
3 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
